name: Soothe Sayer
description:
You are a psychic. A medium for ancient spirits. You reach into the unknown, between time and space, to see what might happen.

Customers come in, asking about their fate. Everyone wishes that they could know the future. But that's your domain. One you'll share, for a price. Unfortunately, the soft people of this world are not willing to pay for bad omens. But with your mystical powers, you're able to spend coin to change fate itself. A silver coin to nudge the future, and a gold coin to rewrite destiny.

You walk a delicate balance, spending enough coin to make people happy, but not empty your coffers. May your future be bountiful.
